info.description: This is an API for IGI (Identity Governance and Intelligence). You can find out more about IGI at [https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSGHJR_5.2.5/com.ibm.igi.doc/reference/ref/ref_governance_rest_api_download.html]. To call API methods, you should first use Basic Authentication and call '/login' operation, The returned token should be used as a Bearer token ('Authorization: Bearer ${Token}') to call next operations.
info.title: Swagger IGI Api

tags.name: AGC
tags.description: Everything about Access Governance API methods

tags.name: ARM
tags.description: Everything about Access Request Management API methods

tags.name: SCIM
tags.description: Everything about SCIM (System for Cross-domain Identity Management) API methods

tags.name: SoD
tags.description: Everything about Separation of Duties API methods

get.description: Login to IGI system and obtains token needed to call next methods.

200.description: OK, body contains token to use calling next api method

get.description: Refresh token. Token expires after N minutes.

200.description: OK, body contains the new token

post.description: Creates the object User that represents the digital identity of a common user of an organization.

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Specifies the group ID in which the user will be created

get.description: Finds User through the User ID. This method returns all groups the user belongs to.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the user to retrieve

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the user to delete

post.description: Finds user through a SCIM search request.
Checks if the password specified is compliant with the password policies of a specific account (see Get Password Policy).

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

post.description: Changes the password of a specific account. In JSON IGIPwd represents the IGI current password for that account.

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

put.description: Changes user account status; disable or enable account depending on the value of query params.

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

post.description: Adds an entitlement to an user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: the ID of the user to add entitlement

parameters.name: entId
parameters.description: Specifies the list of entitlements Ids to add to user.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of Validity of assignment. Date format must be yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of Validity of assignment. Date format must be yyyy-MM-dd

delete.description: Removes one or more entitlements associated to an user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: the ID of the user to add entitlement

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

parameters.name: entId
parameters.description: Specifies the list of entitlement IDs to remove

post.description: Finds the entitlements of the user through a SCIM search request.
Finds group through a SCIM search request.

parameters.name: hierarchyId
parameters.description: Specifies the hierarchy ID (1 for ORGANIZATIONAL_UNIT)

post.description: Finds entitlements in a group through a SCIM search request.
Finds entitlements through a SCIM search request.
Finds users according to a variable set of parameters through a SCIM search request.
Generates request for user role assignment (add roles, remove roles, update roles).

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

get.description: Gets attributes configuration for an account configuration. During account creation gets the list of the attributes. Specifing also the account id gets a list of attribute and for each attribute also its value.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Specify the account identifier of the user. In this way the results contains also the value of the attributes for that account.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID used to find accounts configuration attributes

post.description: Generates request for user modify in order to modify user attributes

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

post.description: Finds user advanced allows to filter also for external attributes.
Finds entitlements to be added during the generation of an request through a SCIM search request.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID used to find entitlements to add.

post.description: Finds the entitlements that are assigned to an user according to the workflow associated to a user through a SCIM search request.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID used to find entitlements to add.

post.description: Generates request for user account management (insert account, update account, delete account).

parameters.name: codeOperation
parameters.description: transaction key that identifies the operation and who performed it (optional parameter). In case it is not set the system automatically creates one like rest_<random_number>.

post.description: Finds assignable accounts for a user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID used to find the assignalble accounts.
